verses.verse: הֵ֛ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor קָצְרָ֥ה <S%H7114><s%> is not shortened יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S מֵֽהוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <S%H3467><s%> that it cannot save וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor כָבְדָ֥ה <S%H3513><s%> heavy אָזְנ֖וֹ <S%H241><s%> neither his ear מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> that it cannot hear

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but עֲוֹנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5771><s%> But your iniquities הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מַבְדִּלִ֔ים <S%H914><s%> have separated בֵּינֵכֶ֕ם <S%H996><s%> between לְבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> you and your God וְחַטֹּֽאותֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H2403><s%> and your sins הִסְתִּ֧ירוּ <S%H5641><s%> have hid פָנִ֛ים <S%H6440><s%> [his] face מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> so מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> from you that he will not hear

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For כַפֵּיכֶם֙ <S%H3709><s%> For your hands נְגֹאֲל֣וּ <S%H1351><s%> are defiled בַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> with blood וְאֶצְבְּעוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H676><s%> and your fingers בֶּֽעָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> with iniquity שִׂפְתֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H8193><s%> your lips דִּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lies לְשׁוֹנְכֶ֖ם <S%H3956><s%> your tongue עַוְלָ֥ה <S%H5766><s%> perverseness תֶהְגֶּֽה׃ <S%H1897><s%> hath muttered

אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> No קֹרֵ֣א <S%H7121><s%> None calleth בְצֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> for justice וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> one נִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> nor [any] pleadeth בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> for truth בָּט֤וֹחַ <S%H982><s%> they trust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in תֹּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H8414><s%> in vanity וְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> and speak שָׁ֔וְא <S%H7723><s%> lies הָר֥וֹ <S%H2029><s%> they conceive עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> mischief וְהוֹלֵ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> and bring forth אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> iniquity

בֵּיצֵ֤י <S%H1000><s%> eggs צִפְעוֹנִי֙ <S%H6848><s%> cockatrice' בִּקֵּ֔עוּ <S%H1234><s%> They hatch וְקוּרֵ֥י <S%H6980><s%> web עַכָּבִ֖ישׁ <S%H5908><s%> the spider's יֶאֱרֹ֑גוּ <S%H707><s%> and weave הָאֹכֵ֤ל <S%H398><s%> he that eateth מִבֵּֽיצֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1000><s%> of their eggs יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> dieth וְהַזּוּרֶ֖ה <S%H2116><s%> and that which is crushed תִּבָּקַ֥ע <S%H1234><s%> breaketh out אֶפְעֶֽה׃ <S%H660><s%> into a viper

קֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6980><s%> Their webs לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְבֶ֔גֶד <S%H899><s%> shall not become garments וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִתְכַּסּ֖וּ <S%H3680><s%> neither shall they cover בְּמַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H4639><s%> themselves with their works מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶם֙ <S%H4639><s%> their works מַֽעֲשֵׂי־ <S%H4639><s%> [are] works אָ֔וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity וּפֹ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> and the act חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> of violence בְּכַפֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3709><s%> [is] in their hands

רַגְלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H7272><s%> Their feet לָרַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> to evil יָרֻ֔צוּ <S%H7323><s%> run וִֽימַהֲר֔וּ <S%H4116><s%> and they make haste לִשְׁפֹּ֖ךְ <S%H8210><s%> to shed דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֑י <S%H5355><s%> innocent מַחְשְׁבֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4284><s%> their thoughts מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> [are] thoughts אָ֔וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity שֹׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> wasting וָשֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> and destruction בִּמְסִלּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4546><s%> [are] in their paths

דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> of peace לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> they know וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> not and [there is] no judgment בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4570><s%> in their goings נְתִיבֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5410><s%> paths עִקְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H6140><s%> they have made them crooked לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> Whoever דֹּרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1869><s%> whosoever goeth בָּ֔הּ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> therein shall not know שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> peace

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that רָחַ֤ק <S%H7368><s%> far מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> Therefore is judgment מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> does not תַשִּׂיגֵ֖נוּ <S%H5381><s%> overtake צְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> from us neither doth justice נְקַוֶּ֤ה <S%H6960><s%> us we wait לָאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> for light וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> but behold obscurity לִנְגֹה֖וֹת <S%H5054><s%> for brightness בָּאֲפֵל֥וֹת <S%H653><s%> in darkness נְהַלֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> [but] we walk

נְגַֽשְׁשָׁ֤ה <S%H1659><s%> We grope כַֽעִוְרִים֙ <S%H5787><s%> like the blind קִ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> for the wall וּכְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> have עֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> as if [we had] no eyes נְגַשֵּׁ֑שָׁה <S%H1659><s%> and we grope כָּשַׁ֤לְנוּ <S%H3782><s%> we stumble בַֽצָּהֳרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H6672><s%> at noonday כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁף <S%H5399><s%> as in the night בָּאַשְׁמַנִּ֖ים <S%H820><s%> [we are] in desolate כַּמֵּתִֽים׃ <S%H4191><s%> places as dead

נֶהֱמֶ֤ה <S%H1993><s%> We roar כַדֻּבִּים֙ <S%H1677><s%> all like bears כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3605><s%> All וְכַיּוֹנִ֖ים <S%H3123><s%> like doves הָגֹ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> and mourn נֶהְגֶּ֑ה <S%H1897><s%> sore נְקַוֶּ֤ה <S%H6960><s%> we look לַמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> for judgment וָאַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> there לִֽישׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H3444><s%> but [there is] none for salvation רָחֲקָ֥ה <S%H7368><s%> [but] it is far off מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַבּ֤וּ <S%H7235><s%> abundance פְשָׁעֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H6588><s%> For our transgressions נֶגְדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5048><s%> before וְחַטֹּאותֵ֖ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> before thee and our sins עָ֣נְתָה <S%H6030><s%> testify בָּ֑נוּ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For פְשָׁעֵ֣ינוּ <S%H6588><s%> against us for our transgressions אִתָּ֔נוּ <S%H854><s%> for וַעֲוֹנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> [are] with us and [as for] our iniquities יְדַֽעֲנֽוּם׃ <S%H3045><s%> we know

פָּשֹׁ֤עַ <S%H6586><s%> In transgressing וְכַחֵשׁ֙ <S%H3584><s%> and lying בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְנָס֖וֹג <S%H5253><s%> and departing away מֵאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> from אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God דַּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> speaking עֹ֣שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> oppression וְסָרָ֔ה <S%H5627><s%> and revolt הֹר֧וֹ <S%H2029><s%> conceiving וְהֹג֛וֹ <S%H1897><s%> and uttering מִלֵּ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> from the heart דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> words שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> of falsehood

וְהֻסַּ֤ג <S%H5253><s%> is turned away אָחוֹר֙ <S%H268><s%> backward מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> And judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and justice מֵרָח֣וֹק <S%H7350><s%> afar off תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> standeth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָשְׁלָ֤ה <S%H3782><s%> is fallen בָֽרְחוֹב֙ <S%H7339><s%> in the street אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> for truth וּנְכֹחָ֖ה <S%H5229><s%> and equity לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> cannot לָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> enter

וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הָֽאֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> Yea truth נֶעְדֶּ֔רֶת <S%H5737><s%> faileth וְסָ֥ר <S%H5493><s%> and he [that] departeth מֵרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> from evil מִשְׁתּוֹלֵ֑ל <S%H7997><s%> maketh himself a prey וַיַּ֧רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD וַיֵּ֥רַע <S%H7489><s%> displeasing בְּעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> his sight כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> him that [there was] no judgment

וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> And he saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that [there was] no man וַיִּשְׁתּוֹמֵ֖ם <S%H8074><s%> and wondered כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> was no מַפְגִּ֑יעַ <S%H6293><s%> that [there was] no intercessor וַתּ֤וֹשַֽׁע <S%H3467><s%> brought salvation לוֹ֙ זְרֹע֔וֹ <S%H2220><s%> therefore his arm וְצִדְקָת֖וֹ <S%H6666><s%> unto him and his righteousness הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he סְמָכָֽתְהוּ׃ <S%H5564><s%> it sustained

וַיִּלְבַּ֤שׁ <S%H3847><s%> For he put on צְדָקָה֙ <S%H6666><s%> righteousness כַּשִּׁרְיָ֔ן <S%H8302><s%> as a breastplate וְכ֥וֹבַע <S%H3553><s%> and an helmet יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H3444><s%> of salvation בְּרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וַיִּלְבַּ֞שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and he put on בִּגְדֵ֤י <S%H899><s%> the garments נָקָם֙ <S%H5359><s%> of vengeance תִּלְבֹּ֔שֶׁת <S%H8516><s%> [for] clothing וַיַּ֥עַט <S%H5844><s%> and was clad כַּמְעִ֖יל <S%H4598><s%> as a cloke קִנְאָֽה׃ <S%H7068><s%> with zeal

כְּעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> According to גְּמֻלוֹת֙ <S%H1578><s%> [their] deeds כְּעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> so יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> accordingly he will repay חֵמָ֣ה <S%H2534><s%> fury לְצָרָ֔יו <S%H6862><s%> to his adversaries גְּמ֖וּל <S%H1576><s%> recompence לְאֹֽיְבָ֑יו <S%H341><s%> to his enemies לָאִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> to the islands גְּמ֥וּל <S%H1576><s%> recompence יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> he will repay

וְיִֽירְא֤וּ <S%H3372><s%> So shall they fear מִֽמַּעֲרָב֙ <S%H4628><s%> from the west אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> from the rising שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבוֹד֑וֹ <S%H3519><s%> and his glory כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָב֤וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come in כַנָּהָר֙ <S%H5104><s%> like a flood צָ֔ר <S%H6862><s%> When the enemy ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נֹ֥סְסָה <S%H5127><s%> shall lift up a standard בֽוֹ׃

וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> shall come לְצִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> to Zion גּוֹאֵ֔ל <S%H1350><s%> And the Redeemer וּלְשָׁבֵ֥י <S%H7725><s%> and unto them that turn פֶ֖שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> from transgression בְּיַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> in Jacob נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בְּרִיתִ֤י <S%H1285><s%> As for me this [is] my covenant אוֹתָם֙ <S%H854><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> with them saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD רוּחִי֙ <S%H7307><s%> My spirit אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וּדְבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> that [is] upon thee and my words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> which I have put בְּפִ֑יךָ <S%H6310><s%> in thy mouth לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָמ֡וּשׁוּ <S%H4185><s%> shall not depart מִפִּיךָ֩ <S%H6310><s%> out of thy mouth וּמִפִּ֨י <S%H6310><s%> nor out of the mouth זַרְעֲךָ֜ <S%H2233><s%> of thy seed וּמִפִּ֨י <S%H6310><s%> nor out of the mouth זֶ֤רַע <S%H2233><s%> of thy seed's זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> seed אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מֵעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from henceforth and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever ס
